Html:
Hi there,

Some questions about new update of flash.
What is the best pratice ? I already seen this : http://wsuspackagepublisher.codeplex.com/discussions/661072
But it don't work for me.

To describe my process :
Check catalog, import new flash from catalog, it appear on the list.
I give an "Expire" option for the previous versions. And push new version with approve for all computer. But i dont have anything new on computers. I must delete software info to have a new update.

I need help ! ;-)

Thanks a lot

It can be marked as solved.
For flash from catalog if we want to have "update", we must have flash installed on the client.... Definitely simple when we know about it.
